Type.Name: Hypertext

TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract Hypertext implements class GLib.IWrapper

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: The interface which provides standard mechanism for manipulating hyperlinks.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Atk.Hyperlink GetLink(int32 link_index) cil managed

Docs.param: an integer specifying the desired link
Docs.summary: The link in this hypertext document at index
Docs.returns: the link in this hypertext document at index

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 GetLinkIndex(int32 char_index) cil managed

Docs.summary: The index into the array of hyperlinks that is associated with the character specified by , or -1 if there is no hyperlink associated with this character.
Docs.returns: an index into the array of hyperlinks in hypertext

Docs.summary: The number of links within this hypertext document.
Docs.value: The number of links within this hypertext document.
